mapper.select: SELECT num, memberIdx, request_date, accept_date, title, business, content, target, term, thumbnail, category_num, accept_return, return_reason FROM projectRequest
mapper.update: UPDATE ProjectRequest SET accept_return = 1, accept_date = SYSDATE WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE ProjectRequest SET accept_return = 0, return_reason = #{reason}, accept_date = SYSDATE WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT m1.memberIdx, m1.name, m2.email1, m2.email2, m1.reg_date, pr.num, pr.title, CASE WHEN ma.authority = 'USER' THEN '대기중' WHEN ma.authority = 'MAKER' THEN '승인' ELSE '기타' END as status FROM member1 m1 JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.memberIdx = m2.memberIdx JOIN memberAuthority ma ON m1.memberIdx = ma.memberIdx JOIN ProjectRequest pr ON m1.memberIdx = pr.memberIdx WHERE ma.authority = 'USER'
AND INSTR(m1.name, #{kwd}) > 0
AND (INSTR(m2.email1, #{kwd}) > 0 OR INSTR(m2.email2, #{kwd}) > 0)
AND TO_CHAR(m1.reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{kwd}
ORDER BY m1.reg_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
